result.execSummary:
The defendant John Edward Krosinski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. John Edward Krosinski is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • John Edward Krosinski was found guilty of Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant granted Huber privileges under rules and regulations of the Columbia County Jail. Sentence may be served in Brown County.

02/22/16 - AMENDED - Defendant may serve sentence in Shawano County
Count 2 dismissed
